PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProfileMechanical
PropertySetDef.Definition: This is a collection of mechanical properties that are applicable to virtually all profile classes. Most of these properties are especially used in structural analysis.

PropertyDef.Name: MassPerLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Mass per length, i.e. mass of a beam with a unit length of extrusion. For example measured in kg/m.

PropertyDef.Name: CrossSectionArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Total area of the cross section (or profile) of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: Perimeter
PropertyDef.Definition:
Perimeter of the object.
Perimeter of the profile for calculating the surface area. For example measured in mm.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumPlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: This value may be needed for stress analysis and to handle buckling problems. It can also be derived from the given profile geometry or classification and therefore it is only an optional feature allowing for an explicit description. For example measured in mm.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumPlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: This value may be needed for stress analysis and to handle buckling problems. It can also be derived from the given profile geometry or classification and therefore it is only an optional feature allowing for an explicit description. For example measured in mm.

PropertyDef.Name: CentreOfGravityInX
PropertyDef.Definition: Location of the profile's centre of gravity (geometric centroid), measured along xp.

PropertyDef.Name: CentreOfGravityInY
PropertyDef.Definition: Location of the profile's centre of gravity (geometric centroid), measured along yp.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearCentreZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Location of the profile's shear centre, measured along zs.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearCentreY
PropertyDef.Definition: Location of the profile's shear centre, measured along ys.

PropertyDef.Name: MomentOfInertiaY
PropertyDef.Definition: Moment of inertia about ys (second moment of area, about ys). For example measured in mm4.

PropertyDef.Name: MomentOfInertiaZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Moment of inertia about zs (second moment of area, about zs). For example measured in mm4

PropertyDef.Name: MomentOfInertiaYZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Moment of inertia about ys and zs (product moment of area). For example measured in mm4.

PropertyDef.Name: TorsionalConstantX
PropertyDef.Definition: Torsional constant about xs. For example measured in mm4.

PropertyDef.Name: WarpingConstant
PropertyDef.Definition: Warping constant of the profile for torsional action. For example measured in mm6.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearDeformationAreaZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Area of the profile for calculating the shear deformation due to a shear force parallel to zs. For example measured in mm². If given, the shear deformation area zs shall be non-negative.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearDeformationAreaY
PropertyDef.Definition: Area of the profile for calculating the shear deformation due to a shear force parallel to ys. For example measured in mm². If given, the shear deformation area ys shall be non-negative.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumSectionModulusY
PropertyDef.Definition: Bending resistance about the ys axis at the point with maximum zs ordinate. For example measured in mm³.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumSectionModulusY
PropertyDef.Definition: Bending resistance about the ys axis at the point with minimum zs ordinate. For example measured in mm³.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumSectionModulusZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Bending resistance about the zs axis at the point with maximum ys ordinate. For example measured in mm³.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumSectionModulusZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Bending resistance about the zs axis at the point with minimum ys ordinate. For example measured in mm³.

PropertyDef.Name: TorsionalSectionModulus
PropertyDef.Definition: Torsional resistance (about xs). For example measured in mm³.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearAreaZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Area of the profile for calculating the shear stress due to shear force parallel to the section analysis axis zs. For example measured in mm². If given, the shear area zs shall be non-negative.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearAreaY
PropertyDef.Definition: Area of the profile for calculating the shear stress due to shear force parallel to the section analysis axis ys. For example measured in mm². If given, the shear area ys shall be non-negative.

PropertyDef.Name: PlasticShapeFactorY
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of plastic versus elastic bending moment capacity about the section analysis axis ys. A dimensionless value.

PropertyDef.Name: PlasticShapeFactorZ
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of plastic versus elastic bending moment capacity about the section analysis axis zs. A dimensionless value.
